src/HyParFunctions/BoundaryIntegral.c

00005 #include <stdlib.h>
00006 #include <basic.h>
00007 #include <arrayfunctions.h>
00008 #include <mpivars.h>
00009 #include <hypar.h>
00010 
00017 int BoundaryIntegral(
00018                       void *s, 
00019                       void *m  
00020                     )
00021 {
00022   HyPar         *solver = (HyPar*)        s;
00023   MPIVariables  *mpi    = (MPIVariables*) m;
00024 
00025   int ndims   = solver->ndims;
00026   int nvars   = solver->nvars;
00027   int *dim    = solver->dim_local;
00028   int ghosts  = solver->ghosts;
00029   int d,v,k;
00030 
00031   double *local_integral  = (double*) calloc (nvars,sizeof(double));
00032   double *global_integral = (double*) calloc (nvars,sizeof(double));
00033 
00034   /* calculate the local boundary integral on each process */
00035   _ArraySetValue_(local_integral,nvars,0.0);
00036   for (d=0; d<ndims; d++) {
00037     for (v=0; v<nvars; v++) {
00038       double dxinv[ndims], dS = 1.0; 
00039       for (k=0; k<ndims; k++) { 
00040         /* uniform grid assumed */
00041         _GetCoordinate_(k,dim[k]/2,dim,ghosts,solver->dxinv,dxinv[k]); 
00042       }
00043       for (k=0; k<ndims; k++) if (k!=d) dS *= (1.0/dxinv[k]);
00044       local_integral[v] += (solver->StepBoundaryIntegral[(2*d+0)*nvars+v])*dS;
00045       local_integral[v] += (solver->StepBoundaryIntegral[(2*d+1)*nvars+v])*dS;
00046     }
00047   }
00048 
00049   /* add across process to calculate global boundary integral 
00050    * (internal (MPI) boundaries must cancel out)
00051    */
00052   IERR MPISum_double(global_integral,local_integral,nvars,&mpi->world); CHECKERR(ierr);
00053 
00054   /* add to the total boundary integral */
00055   _ArrayAXPY_(global_integral,1.0,solver->TotalBoundaryIntegral,nvars);
00056 
00057   free(local_integral);
00058   free(global_integral);
00059   return(0);
00060 }
